name: BriXen
description:
Winner of the "CPC GAMEDEV CONTEST 2020"

Kill the BriXen in 32 challenging tables. 

The final version will be available for the Amstrad CPC (all versions) at DoubleSide Games soon.

Test the demo version of your Amstrad or on your favorite Amstrad emulator
